title: Prawn and cucumber salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 shallots, finely sliced', '1 large garlic clove, sliced', '1 pinch fennel seeds, crushed', '1 small fennel bulb, sliced', '4 tablespoons cold water', '400g raw king prawns, peeled', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1/2 cucumber - halved, seeded and sliced', '1 squeeze lemon juice', '2 tablespoons soured cream', '1 handful freshly chopped parsley']
